statements: SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol='TCP' AND action='ALLOW'
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE alert_type='DDoS' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-02-01'
SELECT DISTINCT protocol FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY protocol
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_id, source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE action = 'blocked' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT destination_ip, action, alert_type FROM network_traffic_data WHERE action = 'allowed' AND alert_type = 'threat_detected' ORDER BY destination_ip, timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, timestamp, action FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'FTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE action IN ('blocked', 'allowed') ORDER BY source_ip ASC, destination_ip DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, data_size FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT destination_ip, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'UDP' AND data_size < 500;
SELECT * FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type = 'DDoS' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT destination_ip, SUM(data_size) AS total_data FROM network_traffic_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY destination_ip ORDER BY total_data DESC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS breach_count FROM security_breaches GROUP BY source_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY breach_count DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, breach_type FROM security_breaches WHERE breach_type IN ('DDoS', 'Malware') ORDER BY source_ip, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND protocol = 'SSH' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT source_address, destination_address, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT breach_id, description, breach_type FROM security_breaches WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE regulatory_body = 'EU GDPR' AND compliance_status = 'non-compliant';
SELECT breach_id, detection_time, status FROM security_breaches ORDER BY detection_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'HTTP' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_address, destination_address FROM network_traffic_data WHERE port = 443 LIMIT 10;
SELECT breach_id, breach_type, status FROM security_breaches WHERE status = 'ongoing';
SELECT regulatory_body, compliance_status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY compliance_status ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_address LIKE '%.com' AND destination_address NOT LIKE '%.org';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE port_number = 80;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, port_number, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY source_ip DESC;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, port_number, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1'
SELECT id, incident_datetime, description FROM security_breaches WHERE severity_level >= 5 ORDER BY severity_level DESC
SELECT regulation_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data WHERE port_number = 80 AND data_size > 1000
SELECT threat_type, detection_datetime FROM detected_threats WHERE details LIKE '%ransomware%'
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, count(*) as count FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM security_events WHERE event_type = 'Unauthorized Access';
SELECT description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT * FROM network_traffic_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM network_traffic_data GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE '%security%' OR description LIKE '%compliance%' ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM security_events GROUP BY event_type HAVING total_events > 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT bd.*, bi.investigator FROM breach_detection bd JOIN breach_investigation bi ON bd.detection_id = bi.detection_id WHERE bd.result = 'Suspicious' ORDER BY bd.timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
